flawed_nl_solution:
Andy weighed 156 + 36 = <<156+36=192>>192 pounds after growing taller.
An eighth of his weight is 1/8 x 192 = <<1/8*192=42>>42 pounds.
Over the next 3 months, Andy lost 42 x 3 = <<42*3=126>>126 pounds.
He now weighs 192 - 126 = <<192-126=66>>66 pounds.
Andy weighs 156 - 66 = <<156-66=90>>90 pounds less than at the beginning of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 24, not 42. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
